mapper.select:
WITH T AS( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (order by MEM_ID desc) RNUM, MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE FROM MEMBERBOARD WHERE 1=1
) Select * FROM T WHERE T.RNUM BETWEEN #{currentPage} * #{show} - (#{show} -1 ) and #{currentPage} * #{show}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERBOARD(MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE) VALUES(#{memId}, #{memPass}, #{memName}, #{memRegno1}, #{memRegno2}, #{memBir}, #{memZip}, #{memAdd1}, #{memAdd2}, #{memHometel}, #{memComtel},#{memHp}, #{memMail},#{memJob}, #{memLike},#{memMemorial}, #{memMemorialday},#{memMileage},#{memDelete})
